text: Brian Turner (born 18 June 1930) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Richmond in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He later played for Box Hill Football Club in the Victorian Football Association and in 1954 was appointed captain coach of Bairnsdale Football Club, but Box Hill refused to issue him a clearance. == Notes == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1930 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Richmond Football Club players Category:Box Hill Football Club players
title: Brian Turner (footballer, born 1930)
